options.name: Ferrosense
options.description: Gain +1 skill with senses. When you make a senses check, you are aware of notable iron within a short (10 units) range.

options.name: Reaction : Iron Shell
options.description: In response to being targeted by an attack, gain +10 physical mitigation against the damage.

options.name: Action : Conductive Throw
options.description: Make a throwing attack with a metal throwing weapon, but use a magic check instead of a throwing check for your attack.

options.name: Innate Magnetism
options.description: Gain +1 skill with concentration. You can move objects mostly composed of iron or steel within very short (5 units) range by making a concentration check instead of a might check.

options.name: Power Forge
options.description: Gain +1 skill with fabrication. When making a fabrication crafting check, add a dice from your highest magical school to the fabrication dice pool.

options.name: Transmuter
options.description: Gain +1 skill with magic. You can spend an hour transmuting any amount of shards, nuggets or ingots as long as the resulting metal is equal to or less than the value of the input.

options.name: Daily Action : Splinter Metal
options.description: You touch a mutable metal object and splinter it into shards. If the object is equipped, this action requires a successful unarmed attack. Items crafted with ingots create 10 shards per ingot used. Before you take a full rest, you can spend a minute reassembling the shards into their original form.

options.name: Arcane Smith
options.description: You may craft fabrication recipes using any one of your magic schools in place of fabrication for the skill check. When you do, you can benefit from at most one infusion on that item.

options.name: Enhanced Metalmancy
options.description: You can enhance spells using metal shavings instead of the listed component. When you declare an enhanced spell, increase the required check by: +2 (Iron), +3-4 (Silver), +5-6 (Gold), +7-8 (Platinum), or +9-11 (Aetherium).

options.name: Metal Magic
options.description: Gain +1 skill with meta magic and +1 skill with primal magic.
